alexwilton.handwritingAssistant

Class MyScriptConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • alexwilton.handwritingAssistant.MyScriptConnection

  • public class MyScriptConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Manages connection to MyScript Cloud's stroke recognition service.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  MyScriptConnection.ConnectionStatus
      Allowed Statuses of Connection to MyScript Cloud Recognition.
      static interface  MyScriptConnection.MessageHandler
      Interface requiring Message Handlers to implement handleMessage().

      • MyScriptConnection

        public MyScriptConnection(java.lang.String applicationKey,
                          java.lang.String hmacKey,
                          java.lang.String myScriptURL)
        Create MyScript Connection instance. Requires necessary connection information (provided by MyScript)
        Parameters:
        applicationKey - Application Key
        hmacKey - HMAC Key
        myScriptURL - MyScript Cloud Recognition URL

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        private void connect()
        Attempt to connect to MyScript Cloud Recognition.

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen(javax.websocket.Session userSession)

        Parameters:

      • onClose

        public void onClose(javax.websocket.Session userSession,
                    javax.websocket.CloseReason reason)
        On closing of current connection to MyScript Cloud Recognition, discard current session.
        Parameters:
        userSession - Old Session
        reason - Reason for session closing.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(java.lang.String jsonMsg)
        On receiving message from MyScript Cloud Recognition, decide how to respond based on received message type.
        Parameters:
        jsonMsg - Message received from MyScript Cloud Recognition as json.

      • sendResetRequest

        private void sendResetRequest()
        Send request to reset current recognition session.

      • sendStartRecogRequest

        private void sendStartRecogRequest(Stroke[] strokes)
        Send start recognition request for provided strokes. Waits for connection to be ready before sending request.
        Parameters:
        strokes - Stroke to request analysis of.

      • waitForReady

        private void waitForReady()
        Wait for connection to be ready to start recognising new strokes.

      • getTextOutputResult

        protected java.lang.String getTextOutputResult(java.lang.String json)
        From a json response from MyScript, extract text output.
        Parameters:
        json - json response from MyScript.
        Returns:
        Text Output

      • getTextOutputs

        private TextOutput getTextOutputs(java.lang.String json)
        Use mapper to construct java objects from MyScript's json response.
        Parameters:
        json - json response from MyScript.
        Returns:
        TextOutput object constructed from MyScript response json.

      • getTextInput

        private org.json.simple.JSONObject getTextInput(Stroke[] strokes)
        Constructs a text input object from strokes for sending to MyScript.
        Parameters:
        strokes - Strokes to be analysed.
        Returns:
        JSONObject in MyScript's desired format.

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Send Asynchronous message to MyScript.
        Parameters:
        message - Message as String to send to MyScript.

      • recognizeStrokes

        public void recognizeStrokes(Stroke[] strokeArray,
                             MyScriptConnection.MessageHandler messageHandler)
        Recognise strokes and set message handler for handing recognition result. Method waits until connection is free before setting handler and sending request (synchronous).
        Parameters:
        strokeArray - Strokes to analyse
        messageHandler - Method to deal with response.

      • computeHMAC

        private java.lang.String computeHMAC(java.lang.String applicationKey,
                                     java.lang.String hmacKey,
                                     java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Compute required value to return to the server with hmac SHA512 hash algorithm It prevents from man-in-the-middle key theft. This method is provided by MyScript.
        Parameters:
        applicationKey - Application Key
        hmacKey - HMAC key
        jsonInput - textInput, mathInput, shapeInput, musicInput or AnalyzerInput
        Returns:
        Required value to return to the server with hmac SHA512 hash algorithm.

      • waitUntilFinished

        public void waitUntilFinished()
        Blocking method which waits for current recognition to be finished.
